chatbot_config.title: Chatbot Configuration
chatbot_config.subtitle: Customize your chatbot's appearance and behavior
chatbot_config.greeting_placeholder: Hello! How can I help you today?
chatbot_config.no_avatar_set_message: No avatar set. Upload an image or enter a URL.
chatbot_config.system_prompt_placeholder: You are a helpful assistant that...
chatbot_config.system_prompt_subtitle: Define specific instructions for the AI. This overrides default behavior settings.
chatbot_config.language_help: Default language for your chatbot interactions
chatbot_config.fallback_placeholder: I'm sorry, I don't have information about that...
chatbot_config.behavior_placeholder: Describe how the chatbot should behave...
chatbot_config.validation_greeting_length: Greeting message must be under 200 characters
chatbot_config.default_greeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
chatbot_config.default_fallback: I'm sorry, I don't have information about that. Could you please rephrase your question?
chatbot_config.avatar_type_error: Please upload a valid image file (PNG, JPEG, GIF, or WebP)
chatbot_config.avatar_size_error: Image size must be less than 2MB
chatbot_config.language_help_text: This sets the primary language for the chatbot's initial greeting and fallback messages. It can still converse in other languages.

dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Create, configure, optimize, and monitor your AI assistants
dashboard.offline_error: Unable to connect to server. Some features may not work properly.

leads.title: Captured Leads
leads.subtitle: View and manage leads captured from your chatbots
leads.search_placeholder: Search by name, email, phone, company...
leads.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this lead?

calendar.google_credentials_error: Google credentials not found. Please authenticate first.

settings.integrations_subtitle: Connect your chatbot with external services and messaging platforms
settings.update_org_subtitle: Update your organization details including name, email, contact phone, and business type
settings.update_password_desc: Update your account password. Make sure to use a strong password.
settings.password_length_error: Password must be at least 8 characters long
settings.password_uppercase_error: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
settings.password_lowercase_error: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
settings.password_number_error: Password must contain at least one number
settings.password_same_error: New password must be different from current password
settings.password_requirements: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers

integrations.google_calendar_desc: Connect your Google Calendar to enable appointment booking and availability checking.
integrations.google_calendar_connected_desc: Google Calendar is connected. You can now use appointment booking features.
integrations.connect_google_for_sheets: Please connect your Google account to enable Sheets integration.
integrations.spreadsheet_id_hint: Get this from your Google Sheets URL:
integrations.sheets_id_required: Please enter a Google Sheets spreadsheet ID
integrations.sheet_name_hint: Name of the sheet tab where leads will be captured (default: Leads)
integrations.crm_active_desc: Your CRM integration is active and ready to capture leads.
integrations.editing_credentials_desc: Editing CRM credentials. Changes will be saved when you click "Save Configuration".
integrations.hubspot_instructions: Go to HubSpot ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Integrations ‚Üí Private Apps ‚Üí Create app
integrations.salesforce_instructions: Get your Security Token from Salesforce ‚Üí My Settings ‚Üí Personal ‚Üí Reset My Security Token
integrations.pipedrive_instructions: Get your API token from Pipedrive ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Personal ‚Üí API
integrations.zoho_instructions: Configure your Zoho OAuth app credentials, then connect using the OAuth flow for secure, one-click integration.
integrations.zoho_configure_desc: Before connecting with OAuth, you need to configure your Zoho OAuth app credentials. Get them from
integrations.region_hint: Select the region where your Zoho CRM account is located
integrations.connect_zoho_hint: Recommended: One-click secure connection via OAuth
integrations.connection_test_failed: Connection test failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
integrations.connect_zoho_error: Please connect with Zoho OAuth or enter all Zoho CRM credentials
integrations.zoho_oauth_creds_missing: Please configure Zoho OAuth app credentials first
integrations.complete_oauth_first: Please complete OAuth authorization first. Click 'Connect with Zoho (OAuth)' to authorize.
integrations.zoho_expired: Your Zoho connection has expired. Please click 'Connect with Zoho (OAuth)' to re-authenticate.
integrations.confirm_disconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect this CRM integration?
integrations.configure_oauth_first: Please configure Zoho OAuth app credentials (Client ID and Client Secret) first
integrations.no_auth_url: No authorization URL received from Zoho
integrations.enter_client_id_secret: Please enter both Client ID and Client Secret
integrations.failed_configure_zoho: Failed to configure Zoho OAuth app
integrations.shopify_cap_1: Show live product information and prices
integrations.shopify_button_settings_desc: Configure which buttons appear in the chat widget for customers.
integrations.collection_hint: Choose which collection to show when customers click the product button.
integrations.order_tracking_hint: Allow customers to check their order status
integrations.shopify_connect_desc: Connect your Shopify store to enable live product data, pricing, and order tracking in your chatbot.
integrations.step_1_desc: Create a custom app in your Shopify store and enter the credentials below. Go to Shopify Admin ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí Develop apps ‚Üí Create an app.
integrations.step_2_hint: Enter your store name from your-store.myshopify.com
integrations.shopify_redirect_info: You'll be redirected to Shopify to authorize the connection. Your credentials are encrypted and stored securely.
integrations.enter_both_creds: Please enter both Client ID and Client Secret
integrations.enter_store_name: Please enter your Shopify store name
integrations.enable_lead_capture_desc: Automatically detect and capture leads from chat conversations
integrations.capture_sheets_desc: Automatically append leads to your Google Sheet
integrations.capture_crm_desc: Automatically create leads in your CRM system
integrations.min_confidence_desc: Higher values require stronger lead indicators (0.0 - 1.0)
integrations.require_contact_desc: Only capture leads with email or phone number
integrations.lead_capture_info: Lead capture will automatically detect potential leads based on: interest keywords, purchase intent, contact information, and demo requests.
integrations.lead_config_load_error: Failed to load lead capture config
